en.description: The Prisma Grinlok is the Prisma variant of the Grinlok semi-automatic rifle featuring higher critical chance, critical multiplier, status chance, magazine, and different damage distribution, but lower accuracy.

ko.description: The Prisma Grinlok is the Prisma variant of the Grinlok semi-automatic rifle featuring higher critical chance, critical multiplier, status chance, magazine, and different damage distribution, but lower accuracy.

ru.description: Гринлок Призма, это как Гринлок, только призма.
